name: Line Breaker
description: Arrows pierce first enemy, hitting also target behind, for half the damage.

name: Lightened Draw
description: Archer attack speed +20%, but reduces damage by 5%.

name: Explosive Demise
description: Explodes on melee contact, damaging and applying burn to enemy.

name: Unstable Fury II
description: Increases damage by 100%, but reduces max health by 99%.

name: Unstable Fury I
description: Increases damage by 50%, but reduces max health by 50%.

name: Overburdened Foundry
description: Reduces unit cost by 30%, but it takes twice as long to spawn

name: Rapid Mobilization Tax
description: Reduces spawn time by 30%, but increases unit cost by 5.

name: Petrifying Gaze
description: On melee contact, turns enemy temporary to sandstone, stopping them from action and increasing damage taken.

name: Mirage of Weakness
description: Kitsune prepares curse every attack, unleashing damage debuff on first target when ready.

name: Extended Aura
description: Supporting area of effect is increased by 32.

name: Broadened Focus
description: Supporting area of effect is increased by 64.

name: Global Influence
description: Supporting area of effect is increased by 96.

name: Reorientation
description: Warrior damage +50, but reduces armor by 100

name: Arcane Resonance
description: Wizard range +64, but slower attacks by 30%

name: Archmage's Boon
description: Wizard's support ability buffs are doubled.
